name: Ruven Themes: Portfolio
author: Ruven

sections.description:
This plugin registers a custom post type for portfolio items and a taxonomy for portfolio types.

Selected themes by Ruven provide templates to display portfolio items.
In other themes you most likely have to add them by yourself.
sections.installation:
This plugin can be installed directly from your site:

  1. Log in and navigate to Plugins → Add New.
  2. Type “Ruven Themes: Portfolio” into the Search input and click the “Search Plugins” button.
  3. Locate the “Ruven Themes: Portfolio” in the list of search results and click “Install Now”.
  4. Click the “Activate Plugin” link at the bottom of the install screen.
  5. A “Portfolio” menu item will appear in the admin menu.

It can also be installed manually:

  1. Download the “Ruven Themes: Portfolio” plugin from WordPress.org.
  2. Unzip the package and move it into your plugins directory.
  3. Log into WordPress and navigate to the “Plugins” screen.
  4. Locate “Ruven Themes: Portfolio” in the list and click the “Activate” link.
  5. A “Portfolio” menu item will appear in the admin menu.

short_description: RT Portfolio enables a "Portfolio" post type and "Type" taxonomy.
description:
This plugin registers a custom post type for portfolio items and a taxonomy for portfolio types.

Selected themes by Ruven provide templates to display portfolio items.
In other themes you most likely have to add them by yourself.
